text:
In this video, we will
show you the quick steps
needed to download Elden Ring on PC.

We will be using the popular
online gaming store Steam.

To start, open Steam,
go to the search bar,
and type in Elden Ring.
Once on the store page,

choose what version of
Elden Ring you'd like.

The basic edition comes
with the full game,

and the deluxe edition
comes with the full game
plus a digital art book
and downloadable original soundtrack.
Choose your purchase option,
then choose your payment method
and click "Purchase."

A screen will then appear
confirming your purchase.

Once you own the game, go
to your library on Steam
and scroll until you see Elden Ring.
Click "INSTALL,"
choose the download path,
and follow the prompts.

You can check the
progress of your download
on the game's page in your library

or by going to the
downloading tab of Steam.
Once the game finishes downloading,
you can hit "PLAY" to launch
and enjoy your new copy of Elden Ring.
